level.text: All mixed martial arts events shall comply with the health and safety requirements of 19 DCMR 2126 regarding the protection of contestants during an event.
All mixed martial arts events shall comply with the health and safety requirements of 19 DCMR 2127 regarding the protection of contestants after an event.

All promoters of mixed martial arts events shall provide medical information, facilities and equipment, including but not limited to a stretcher and emergency oxygen, adequate for emergency occasions, and an ambulance for each mixed martial arts event, and all such medical facilities and equipment shall be approved in advance by the Commission.
All mixed martial arts events shall comply with the insurance requirements of 19 DCMR 2026.
